text: Thomas Shepherd may refer to: * Thomas H. Shepherd (1792–1864), water colour artist known for his architectural works * Tom Shepherd (1889–1957), English cricketer who played for Surrey * Thomas "Tommy", Shepherd aka Speed * Thomas Luther Shepherd (1829–1884), New Zealand politician ==See also== * Thomas Shepard (disambiguation) * Thomas Sheppard (disambiguation)
title: Thomas Shepherd
